revised_title: Generalizing Ledge Growth Theory for Continuous Distributions
tldr: The authors extended the ledge growth theory to include continuous distributions of ledges, providing a new approach to understanding the interactions and transformations of ledges in materials. They developed a model for continuous distributions of steps and explored various problems, including infinite and semi-infinite distributions and traveling waves. This work complements previous studies on finite trains of ledges and offers new insights into the macroscopic diffusion models and transformation mechanisms.
